1995.text: In 1995, Apple continued its innovation streak with the release of the PowerBook 5300, further solidifying its position in the personal computing market.

1996.text: 1996 marked a significant milestone for Apple with the introduction of the Macintosh Performa series, catering to a broader consumer base.

1997.text: The year 1997 saw Apple making waves with the launch of the iconic Power Macintosh G3, setting new standards in performance and design.

1999.text: As the millennium approached, Apple made headlines with the unveiling of the colorful iMac G3, captivating users with its bold design and user-friendly features.
